titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C09

body.ab: <lb n="c56-0031__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0031.07" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 5<lb n="c56-0031__main__2"/> From this day natural philosophy and parti<lb n="c56-0031__main__3"/>cularly chemistry became <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>nearly my sole <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5483__Start"/>appli<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5483__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__main__4"/> study. I read with ardour <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5488__Start"/>m<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5488__End"/> those books <lb n="c56-0031__main__5"/> so full of genius and discrimination <lb n="c56-0031__main__6"/><mdel>th</mdel><del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5500__Start"/>at have been written<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5500__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/> which modern <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/> enquirers on these sub<lb n="c56-0031__main__7"/>jects. I attended the lectures, and culti<lb n="c56-0031__main__8"/>vated the acquaintance of the men <lb n="c56-0031__main__9"/> of science of the university; and I found <lb n="c56-0031__main__10"/> even in Mr Krempe a great deal <lb n="c56-0031__main__11"/> of sound sense & real information <lb n="c56-0031__main__12"/> combined it is true with a repulsive <lb n="c56-0031__main__13"/> phisiognomy & manners, but not on <lb n="c56-0031__main__14"/> that account the less valuable. <lb n="c56-0031__main__15"/> In M. Waldman I found a true friend. <lb n="c56-0031__main__16"/> His gentleness was never tinged by <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5548__Start"/>dg<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5548__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__main__17"/> dogmatism and his instructions were <lb n="c56-0031__main__18"/> given with an air of frankness and <lb n="c56-0031__main__19"/> good nature that banished every idea <lb n="c56-0031__main__20"/> of <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5563__Start"/>pedantl<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5563__End"/> pedantry. It was perhaps the <lb n="c56-0031__main__21"/> amiable character of this man that <lb n="c56-0031__main__22"/> enclined me more to the study of that <lb n="c56-0031__main__23"/> branch of <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5575__Start"/>science<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5575__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>natural philosophy which he professed than an intrinsic <lb n="c56-0031__main__24"/> love for the science itself. But this <lb n="c56-0031__main__25"/><metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0031.03">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/><del loc="c56-0031__left_margin__d1e5601__Start"/>circumstance<del loc="c56-0031__left_margin__d1e5601__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__3"/><mdel>of</mdel><del loc="c56-0031__left_margin__d1e5609__Start"/>was had<del loc="c56-0031__left_margin__d1e5609__End"/><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__4"/> state of mind had <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__5"/> place <metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5621__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5621__End"/> only in the first steps towards the <lb n="c56-0031__main__26"/> knowledge; <mdel>as</mdel>the more fully I entered <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5635__Start"/>more fully<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5635__End"/> into <lb n="c56-0031__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5641__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5641__End"/><del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5644__Start"/>philosophy<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5644__End"/>science the more I <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5654__Start"/>studied<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5654__End"/><mdel>s</mdel> pursued it <lb n="c56-0031__main__28"/> for its own sake. That application <lb n="c56-0031__main__29"/> which at first had been a matter <lb n="c56-0031__main__30"/> of <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5671__Start"/>ch<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5671__End"/> duty <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>& resolution, now became so ardent <lb n="c56-0031__main__31"/> and eager that the stars often <lb n="c56-0031__main__32"/> dissapeared <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__1"/> in the light of <lb n="c56-0031__left_margin__2"/> morning while I was yet <del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5703__Start"/>labouring<del loc="c56-0031__main__d1e5703__End"/>engaged<lb n="c56-0031__main__33"/> in my labrotary.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0032__main__1"/> As I applied so closely, it may be <lb n="c56-0032__main__2"/> easily conceived that I improved rapid<lb n="c56-0032__main__3"/>ly. <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5729__Start"/>It<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5729__End"/> My ardour was indeed the astonish<lb n="c56-0032__main__4"/>ment of the students, and my proficiency <lb n="c56-0032__main__5"/> that of the master. <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5740__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5740__End"/> Professor Krempe <lb n="c56-0032__main__6"/> often asked me with a sly smile <lb n="c56-0032__main__7"/> how Cornelius Agrippa went on;<metamark function="insert">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/> while M. Waldham <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__2"/> expressed the most <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__3"/> heartfelt exultation <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__4"/> in my progress. Two <lb n="c56-0032__main__8"/> years passed in this manner during <lb n="c56-0032__main__9"/> which I paid no visit to Geneva, but <lb n="c56-0032__main__10"/><del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5778__Start"/>ws<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5778__End"/> was engaged heart and soul in the <lb n="c56-0032__main__11"/> pursuit of some discoveries which I <lb n="c56-0032__main__12"/> hoped to make. <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5785__Start"/>No one<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5785__End"/> None but those <lb n="c56-0032__main__13"/> who have experienced it can conceive <lb n="c56-0032__main__14"/> of the enticements of science–<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5793__Start"/>especially<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5793__End"/> In <lb n="c56-0032__main__15"/> other studies you go as far as others have <lb n="c56-0032__main__16"/><mdel>d</mdel>gone before you and there is nothing <lb n="c56-0032__main__17"/> more to <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5812__Start"/>learn<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5812__End"/><mdel>,</mdel>know, learn, but in a scientific <lb n="c56-0032__main__18"/> pursuit <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5825__Start"/>their<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5825__End"/> there is continual <lb n="c56-0032__main__19"/> food for discovery and wonder. A mind <lb n="c56-0032__main__20"/> of <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5832__Start"/>even<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5832__End"/> moderate capacity who closely pursues <lb n="c56-0032__main__21"/> one study must infallibly arrive at <lb n="c56-0032__main__22"/> great proficiency in th<mdel>e</mdel>at study—And I <lb n="c56-0032__main__23"/> who <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5851__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5851__End"/> continually <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5856__Start"/>applied to<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5856__End"/>sought the attainment of one <lb n="c56-0032__main__24"/><del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5867__Start"/>thing<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5867__End"/>object <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/>pursuit and was wra<mdel></mdel>pt up <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5892__Start"/>as I was<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5892__End"/> in this sole<lb n="c56-0032__main__25"/><del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5900__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5900__End"/> improved so rapidly that at the end <lb n="c56-0032__main__26"/> of the two years I made <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5905__Start"/>one or two<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5905__End"/>some<lb n="c56-0032__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5912__Start"/>trifling<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5912__End"/> discoveries in the improvement <lb n="c56-0032__main__28"/> of some chemical <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5921__Start"/>machines<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5921__End"/>instruments which pro<lb n="c56-0032__main__29"/>cured me great esteem and admiration <lb n="c56-0032__main__30"/> at the university. When I arrived at <lb n="c56-0032__main__31"/> this <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>point, <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__1"/> and ha<mdel>v</mdel>d<mdel>ng</mdel> learned <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__2"/> all the professors <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__3"/> at Ingolstadt were <lb n="c56-0032__left_margin__4"/> qualified to teach<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5965__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5965__End"/> m<mdel></mdel>y residence <del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5977__Start"/>at In<del loc="c56-0032__main__d1e5977__End"/><lb n="c56-0033__main__1"/><del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5987__Start"/>golstadt was<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e5987__End"/><lb n="c56-0033__left_margin__1"/>there being no longer conducive to <lb n="c56-0033__main__2"/> my improvement, I thought of returning <lb n="c56-0033__main__3"/> to my friends and to my native town, <lb n="c56-0033__main__4"/> when an incident happened that <lb n="c56-0033__main__5"/> protracted my stay.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0033__main__6"/> One of those phænonoma which <lb n="c56-0033__main__7"/> had <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6015__Start"/>mo<mdel>re</mdel>st<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6015__End"/> peculiarly attracted my atten<lb n="c56-0033__main__8"/>tion was the structure of the human <lb n="c56-0033__main__9"/> frame; and indeed that of any animal <lb n="c56-0033__main__10"/> endued with life. Whence I often asked <lb n="c56-0033__main__11"/> myself did this principle of life proceed. <lb n="c56-0033__main__12"/> It was a bold question, and one <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6041__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6041__End"/><lb n="c56-0033__left_margin__1"/>which<lb n="c56-0033__main__13"/> has ever been considered as a mystery. <lb n="c56-0033__main__14"/> Yet how many things are we on the <lb n="c56-0033__main__15"/> brink of becoming acquainted with <lb n="c56-0033__main__16"/> if cowardice or carelessness did <lb n="c56-0033__main__17"/> not restrain <mdel>us</mdel>our enquiries?. I revolved these circum<lb n="c56-0033__main__18"/>stances in my mind and determined <lb n="c56-0033__main__19"/> from thenceforth to apply myself more <lb n="c56-0033__main__20"/> particularly to th<mdel>at</mdel>ose branches of natural <lb n="c56-0033__main__21"/> philosophy which <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6099__Start"/>treats<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6099__End"/><mdel>of</mdel>relate to phisiology. <lb n="c56-0033__main__22"/> Unless I had been animated by an al<lb n="c56-0033__main__23"/>most supernatural enthusiasm, my <lb n="c56-0033__main__24"/> application to this study would have <lb n="c56-0033__main__25"/> been irksome and almost intolerable. <lb n="c56-0033__main__26"/> To examine the causes of life <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6124__Start"/>de<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6124__End"/> we must <lb n="c56-0033__main__27"/> first have <del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6131__Start"/>recou<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6131__End"/> recourse to death. <lb n="c56-0033__main__28"/><del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6135__Start"/>No is ano anatomy<del loc="c56-0033__main__d1e6135__End"/> I became acquainted <lb n="c56-0033__main__29"/> with the science of anatomy but this <lb n="c56-0033__main__30"/> was not sufficient. I must also observe <lb n="c56-0033__main__31"/> the natural decay & corruption of the <lb n="c56-0033__main__32"/> human body. In my education<lb n="c56-0034__main__1"/> my father had taken the greatest <lb n="c56-0034__main__2"/> precautions that my mind should <lb n="c56-0034__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6158__Start"/>not<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6158__End"/> be impressed by ^no supernatural <lb n="c56-0034__main__4"/> horrors. I do not ever remember <lb n="c56-0034__main__5"/> having trembled at <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6177__Start"/>a ghost story<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6177__End"/>tale of superstition or <lb n="c56-0034__main__6"/> to have feared the apparition of a spirit <lb n="c56-0034__main__7"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6190__Start"/>Ligh<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6190__End"/> Darkness had no effect upon my <lb n="c56-0034__main__8"/> fancy and a churchyard was to <lb n="c56-0034__main__9"/> me merely ^as the receptacle of <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6207__Start"/>rotten b<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6207__End"/><lb n="c56-0034__main__10"/> bodies deprived of life and <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6214__Start"/>becoming<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6214__End"/>which<lb n="c56-0034__main__11"/> from being the seat of beauty &<lb n="c56-0034__main__12"/> strength ^become food for the worm. <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6235__Start"/>But<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6235__End"/><lb n="c56-0034__main__13"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6239__Start"/>I <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6239__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6243__Start"/>A loathsome<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6243__End"/>c<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6249__Start"/>But<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6249__End"/> now I was <lb n="c56-0034__main__14"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6255__Start"/>obliged<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6255__End"/>led to examine the <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6264__Start"/>cause<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6264__End"/>cause& progress <lb n="c56-0034__main__15"/> of this decay and forced to spend days <lb n="c56-0034__main__16"/> and nights in vaults and Charnel <lb n="c56-0034__main__17"/> houses. I <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6281__Start"/>was obliged<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6281__End"/> My attention was <lb n="c56-0034__main__18"/> fixed upon every <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6289__Start"/>horror of whic<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6289__End"/><mdel>h</mdel>object <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6297__Start"/>calculated to<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6297__End"/>the most insupportable to the delicacy of<lb n="c56-0034__main__19"/> the human feelings. <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6306__Start"/>are suscept<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6306__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6308__Start"/>able<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6308__End"/>– <lb n="c56-0034__main__20"/> I saw how the fine form of <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6313__Start"/>a<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6313__End"/> man <lb n="c56-0034__main__21"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6320__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6320__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6323__Start"/>became<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6323__End"/><lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__1"/>was degraded and wasted. I beheld the <lb n="c56-0034__main__22"/> corruption of death succeed to the bloom<lb n="c56-0034__main__23"/>ing cheek of life – I saw how the wormsuc<lb n="c56-0034__main__24"/>ceeded toinherited the wonders of the eye and <lb n="c56-0034__main__25"/> brain. I paused, examin<mdel>ed</mdel>ing and anal<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6369__Start"/>yzed<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6369__End"/>yzing<lb n="c56-0034__main__26"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6377__Start"/>every<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6377__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6380__Start"/>minutiæ<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6380__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6383__Start"/> of <del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6383__End"/><del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6386__Start"/>causation<del loc="c56-0034__main__d1e6386__End"/><lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__1"/> all the minutiæ <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__2"/> of causation <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__3"/> as exemplified in <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__4"/> the change from <lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__5"/> life to death, &<lb n="c56-0034__left_margin__6"/> death to life, untill <lb n="c56-0034__main__27"/> from the midst of this darkness <lb n="c56-0034__main__28"/> a sudden light broke in upon me. <lb n="c56-0034__main__29"/> A light so brilliant & wondrous yet<lb n="c56-0035__main__1"/> so simple that while it intoxica<lb n="c56-0035__main__2"/>ted me<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__1"/> I became dizzy <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__2"/> with the immen<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__3"/>sity of the prospect <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__4"/> which it illus<lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__5"/>trated, I was surprised that I <lb n="c56-0035__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6460__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6460__End"/> among so many men of genius <lb n="c56-0035__main__4"/> who had applied to the same science <lb n="c56-0035__main__5"/> that I alone should discover <lb n="c56-0035__main__6"/> this astonishing secret.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0035__main__7"/> Remember I am <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>not recording the <lb n="c56-0035__main__8"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6485__Start"/>no<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6485__End"/> vision <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6489__Start"/>of<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6489__End"/> of a madman – the <lb n="c56-0035__main__9"/> sun does not more certainly shine <lb n="c56-0035__main__10"/> in the heavens than that wh<mdel>at</mdel>ich<lb n="c56-0035__main__11"/> I now <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6506__Start"/>record<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6506__End"/>affirm, is true. Some miracle <lb n="c56-0035__main__12"/> might have produced it. But the <lb n="c56-0035__main__13"/> stages of discovery were distinct <lb n="c56-0035__main__14"/> and probable. After days and nights <lb n="c56-0035__main__15"/> of incredible <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6524__Start"/>toil<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6524__End"/>labour and fatigue <lb n="c56-0035__main__16"/> I succeeded in discovering the <lb n="c56-0035__main__17"/> cause of generation & life. Nay <lb n="c56-0035__main__18"/> more, I <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6540__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6540__End"/>became myself capable of <lb n="c56-0035__main__19"/> bestowing animation upon lifeless <lb n="c56-0035__main__20"/> matter.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0035__main__21"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6555__Start"/>My<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6555__End"/> The surprise <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6560__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6560__End"/>which I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>at firstexperienced <lb n="c56-0035__main__22"/> on this discovery soon gave place to <lb n="c56-0035__main__23"/> delight and rapture. After such <lb n="c56-0035__main__24"/> painful labour<metamark function="insert" xml:id="c56-0035.06">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__1"/> After so much <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__2"/><metamark function="displacement">^</metamark>time spent in <lb n="c56-0035__left_margin__3"/> painful labour<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6607__Start"/>come<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6607__End"/>to arrive at onece <lb n="c56-0035__main__25"/> at the <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6619__Start"/>obj ect<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6619__End"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6622__Start"/>object<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6622__End"/>summit of my desires <lb n="c56-0035__main__26"/> was the most gratifying circumstance <lb n="c56-0035__main__27"/> that could have occurred. But this <lb n="c56-0035__main__28"/> discovery was so great and overwhelm<lb n="c56-0035__main__29"/>ing that <del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6642__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6642__End"/><del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6645__Start"/>reflection<del loc="c56-0035__main__d1e6645__End"/> all the<lb n="c56-0036__main__1"/> steps <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6657__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6657__End"/>by which I had beenprogressively led to it were <lb n="c56-0036__main__2"/> obliterated. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>andI <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6678__Start"/>saw<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6678__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>beheld only the result. What <lb n="c56-0036__main__3"/> had been the study and desire of the <lb n="c56-0036__main__4"/><del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6693__Start"/>m<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6693__End"/> wisest men since the creation of <lb n="c56-0036__main__5"/> the world was now <mdel>in</mdel>within my <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6709__Start"/>hands.<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6709__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>grasp; Not <lb n="c56-0036__main__6"/> that, like a magic <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6723__Start"/>sceen<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6723__End"/> scene it <lb n="c56-0036__main__7"/> all opened upon me at on<mdel>e</mdel>ce<mdel>;</mdel>.on <lb n="c56-0036__main__8"/> the contrary<mdel>t</mdel>The <del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6764__Start"/>big<del loc="c56-0036__main__d1e6764__End"/> information <lb n="c56-0036__main__9"/> I had obtained was <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of a nature rather one that <lb n="c56-0036__main__10"/> would<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to direct my endeavours. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that <lb n="c56-0036__main__11"/> than show me the prospect with <lb n="c56-0036__main__12"/> any precise certainty.<lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">^</metamark>so soon as I <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__2"/> should point <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__3"/> them towards <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__4"/> the object of <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__5"/> my search, <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__6"/> than to exhi<lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__7"/>bit that ob<lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__8"/>ject already <lb n="c56-0036__left_margin__9"/> accomplished. I collected bones from <lb n="c56-0041__main__4"/> Charnel houses and with profane fingers <lb n="c56-0041__main__5"/> meddled with the secrets of the human <lb n="c56-0041__main__6"/> frame. In a solitary chamber–or rather <lb n="c56-0041__main__7"/> cell at the top of the house and seperated <lb n="c56-0041__main__8"/> from all other appartments by a gallery <lb n="c56-0041__main__9"/> and staircase I <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7952__Start"/>h<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7952__End"/> kept my workshop <lb n="c56-0041__main__10"/> of filthy creation; my eyeballs were <lb n="c56-0041__main__11"/> starting from their sockets in at<lb n="c56-0041__main__12"/>tending to the minutiæ of <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7966__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7966__End"/> my <lb n="c56-0041__main__13"/> employment. The dissecting room and <lb n="c56-0041__main__14"/> the slaughter house furnished many <lb n="c56-0041__main__15"/> of my materials, and often did my <lb n="c56-0041__main__16"/> human nature turn from my <lb n="c56-0041__main__17"/> occupation <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7982__Start"/>but<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7982__End"/><mdel>I</mdel>whilst<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7991__Start"/>wal<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7991__End"/><del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7994__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e7994__End"/> still urged <lb n="c56-0041__main__18"/> on by an eagerness which perpetually encreased, <lb n="c56-0041__main__19"/><mdel>as</mdel><lb n="c56-0041__left_margin__1"/>I brought my work <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8018__Start"/>drew<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8018__End"/> near <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to a conclusion.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0041__main__20"/> The <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8035__Start"/>sums<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8035__End"/> Summer months <lb n="c56-0041__main__21"/> passed while I was thus <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8043__Start"/>employed<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8043__End"/>engaged,<lb n="c56-0041__main__22"/> heart and soul, in one pursuit. It <lb n="c56-0041__main__23"/> was a most beautiful season: never <lb n="c56-0041__main__24"/> did the fields bestow a more plentiful <lb n="c56-0041__main__25"/> harvest, or the vines yeild a more <lb n="c56-0041__main__26"/> luxuriant vintage. But my eyes were <lb n="c56-0041__main__27"/><mdel>s</mdel><del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8067__Start"/>hut<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8067__End"/><lb n="c56-0041__left_margin__1"/>insensible to the charms of nature & the <lb n="c56-0041__main__28"/> same feelings which <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8082__Start"/>caused<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8082__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>made me <del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8093__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0041__main__d1e8093__End"/><lb n="c56-0041__main__29"/> neglect the scenes around me caused <lb n="c56-0041__main__30"/> me also to forget those friends who <lb n="c56-0041__main__31"/> were so many miles absent and whom <lb n="c56-0041__main__32"/> I had not seen for so long a time.<lb n="c56-0042__main__1"/> I knew that my silence disquieted <lb n="c56-0042__main__2"/> them and I well remembered the <lb n="c56-0042__main__3"/> words of my father. "I know that while <lb n="c56-0042__main__4"/> "you are pleased with yourself you <lb n="c56-0042__main__5"/> "will <del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e8121__Start"/>thing<del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e8121__End"/> think of us with affection <lb n="c56-0042__main__6"/> "and we shall hear regularly from <lb n="c56-0042__main__7"/> "you. And you must pardon me <lb n="c56-0042__main__8"/> "if I regard <del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e8130__Start"/>you<del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e8130__End"/> any interruption <lb n="c56-0042__main__9"/> "in A human <lb n="c56-0042__main__26"/> being in perfection ought always to <lb n="c56-0042__main__27"/> preserve a <del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e8330__Start"/>cl<del loc="c56-0042__main__d1e8330__End"/> calm and peaceful <lb n="c56-0042__main__28"/> mind and never to allow passion<lb n="c56-0043__main__1"/> or ^a transitory desire to disturb his <lb n="c56-0043__main__2"/> tranquillity. I do not think that the pursuit <lb n="c56-0043__main__3"/> of knowledge is any exception to this rule. <lb n="c56-0043__main__4"/> If the study to which you apply yourself <lb n="c56-0043__main__5"/> has a <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8360__Start"/>d<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8360__End"/> tendency to weaken your affections <lb n="c56-0043__main__6"/> and to destroy your taste for those simple <lb n="c56-0043__main__7"/> pleasures in which no alloy can possibly <lb n="c56-0043__main__8"/> mix then that study is certainly unlawful <lb n="c56-0043__main__9"/> that <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8372__Start"/>it<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8372__End"/> is to say <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8375__Start"/>on that<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8375__End"/> not befitting <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8378__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8378__End"/> the <lb n="c56-0043__main__10"/> human mind. If this <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8383__Start"/>rul<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8383__End"/> rule <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8388__Start"/>was<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8388__End"/>were al <lb n="c56-0043__main__11"/> ways observed; if no man allowed any <lb n="c56-0043__main__12"/> pursuit whatsoever to interfere with <lb n="c56-0043__main__13"/> his tranquillity and his domestic affections <lb n="c56-0043__main__14"/> Greece had never been enslaved, Cæsar <lb n="c56-0043__main__15"/> would have spared his country, America <lb n="c56-0043__main__16"/> would have been discovered more gradual<lb n="c56-0043__main__17"/>ly, and the Empires of Mexico & Peru had <lb n="c56-0043__main__18"/> not been destroyed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0043__main__19"/> But I forget that I am moralizing <lb n="c56-0043__main__20"/> in the most interresting part of my <lb n="c56-0043__main__21"/> tale; and your looks remind me to <lb n="c56-0043__main__22"/> proceed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0043__main__23"/> My father made no reproach in his <lb n="c56-0043__main__24"/> letters, <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8440__Start"/>an<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8440__End"/> and only took notice of my <lb n="c56-0043__main__25"/> silence by enquiring more particularly <lb n="c56-0043__main__26"/> than before what my <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8447__Start"/>co<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8447__End"/> occupations <lb n="c56-0043__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8452__Start"/>wer<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8452__End"/> were. Winter spring and summer <lb n="c56-0043__main__28"/> passed away during my <mdel>t</mdel>labours but <lb n="c56-0043__main__29"/> I did not watch the blossom or the <lb n="c56-0043__main__30"/> expanding leaves – sights which before <lb n="c56-0043__main__31"/> had alway yeilded me supreme delight.<lb n="c56-0043__main__32"/> so <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8480__Start"/>much<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8480__End"/>deeply was I <del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8489__Start"/>taken up with<del loc="c56-0043__main__d1e8489__End"/>engrossed in my<lb n="c56-0044__main__1"/> occupation. The leaves of that year <lb n="c56-0044__main__2"/> were withered before my work drew <lb n="c56-0044__main__3"/> near a close. And now every day shewed <lb n="c56-0044__main__4"/> me more plainly how well I had suc<lb n="c56-0044__main__5"/>ceeded. But my enthusiasm was <lb n="c56-0044__main__6"/> checked by my <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8518__Start"/>am<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8518__End"/> anxiety and I appeared <lb n="c56-0044__main__7"/> rather like one doomed by slavery <lb n="c56-0044__main__8"/> to toil in the mines or any other <lb n="c56-0044__main__9"/> unwholsome trade than an artist <lb n="c56-0044__main__10"/> occupied in his favourite employment. <lb n="c56-0044__main__11"/> Every <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8532__Start"/>nigh<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8532__End"/> night a slow fever oppressed <lb n="c56-0044__main__12"/> me and I became <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8539__Start"/>nevous<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8539__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>nervous to a <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8551__Start"/>degre<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8551__End"/><lb n="c56-0044__main__13"/> most painful degree; a <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8556__Start"/>fever<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8556__End"/> a dis<lb n="c56-0044__main__14"/>ease I regretted the more because I had <lb n="c56-0044__main__15"/> hitherto enjoyed excellent health &<lb n="c56-0044__main__16"/><del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8572__Start"/>my nerves<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8572__End"/><del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8575__Start"/>were fi<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8575__End"/> had always <lb n="c56-0044__main__17"/> boasted of <mdel>my</mdel>the firmness<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of my nerves. But I <lb n="c56-0044__main__18"/> believed that exercise and amusement <lb n="c56-0044__main__19"/> would soon <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8607__Start"/>driv<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8607__End"/> drive away <del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8613__Start"/>these<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8613__End"/>suchsym<lb n="c56-0044__main__20"/><del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8623__Start"/>p<del loc="c56-0044__main__d1e8623__End"/>toms and I promised myself both <lb n="c56-0044__main__21"/> of these when my creation should be <lb n="c56-0044__main__22"/> comple<mdel>et</mdel>te<mdel>ed</mdel>.
